testcase.classname: US_012_TC011 Edit Button and Save date
testcase.name: TC_00011 The Edit portal can allow the user to create or update the user info
testcase.system-out: Given Go to the GMIBank sign in page........................................passed And Type username and password then click on sign in button.................passed And Click on My Operations dropdown menu....................................passed And Click the Manage Customers button.......................................passed And Click on Edit button....................................................passed And Clear on the customer Email textbox.....................................passed And Click on the customer Email textbox and type a new Email................passed And Clear on the customer Mobile Phone Number textbox.......................passed And Click on the customer Mobile Phone Number textbox and type a new Mobile Phone Number.passed And Clear on the customer Phone Number textbox..............................passed And Click on the customer Phone Number textbox and type a new Phone Number..passed And Clear on the customer Zip Code textbox..................................passed And Click on the customer Zip Code textbox and type a new Zip Code..........passed And Clear on the customer Address textbox...................................passed And Click on the customer Address textbox and type a new Address............passed And Clear on the customer City textbox......................................passed And Click on the customer City textbox and type a new City..................passed And Clear on the customer Create Date textbox...............................passed And Click on the customer Create Date textbox and type a new Create Date....passed And Clear on the customer State textbox.....................................passed And Click on the customer State textbox and type a new State................passed And Click on Zelle Enrolled.................................................passed And Click on Save button....................................................passed Then The user should see a message confirming that they have saved the edited information..passed
